name: Global Value Solutions
overview: Global Value Solutions SA provides information technology services to small and medium businesses in Brazil. It offers systems integration, hosting/co-location, applications management and software development, ERP consulting and application, network management, security management, ondemand printing, business continuity and recovery services, service desk, workstation support, and industrial solutions, such as CAD, CAM, traceability, RFID, and PLM. Global Value Solutions SA serves the automotive, automobile parts, metallurgy, finance, services, and telecommunications industries. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Nova Lima, Brazil. Global Value Solutions SA operates as a subsidiary of IBM Italia S.p.A.

acquisition.source_description: IBM Acquires Full Ownership of Brazilian SMB Services Firm Global Value Solutions
